name: Proactive Scheduling
description: AI-powered crew assignment proposals with 1-click accept/tweak functionality.

prd.problemStatement: Scheduling crew assignments is time-consuming and requires understanding of availability, skills, workload, and priorities. Superintendents need intelligent recommendations to speed up this process.
goals: Automatically propose optimal crew assignments based on workload, skills, and availability
Support quick tweaks and adjustments to proposals
Learn from user preferences and past decisions
userStories: As a superintendent, I want the system to propose crew assignments so that I save time on scheduling
As a superintendent, I want to accept scheduling proposals with 1 click so that I can quickly approve good plans
As a superintendent, I want to easily tweak proposals so that I can make minor adjustments without starting over
As a superintendent, I want the system to learn my preferences so that proposals improve over time
dependencies: Crew and templates system must be implemented
